name: Lil Gang - City Heist
description:
Your all star gangster squad is ready to party, right after you help them escape with the loot, enjoy the game that will make you laugh and cheer at the same time.
We are proud to present our new free game, the arcade extravaganza, Lil Gang : City Heist, take control of your favorite gangster and bring him home with all the loot you can imagine, avoid getting caught and the glory is yours.


UNLOCK many characters and skins
UNLOCK new levels
UPGRADE your characters
Amazing next gen mobile graphics
Awesome sound design
Many in game power ups
Everything is free.
